message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_FV_MANDATORY_INCIDENT_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Incident must be set for Incident Participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_USER_OR_CONCERN_NOT_SET
message.locale: A Curam participant or user must be selected as the Incident Participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_USER_AND_CONCERN_BOTH_SET
message.locale: An Incident Participant can not be both a Curam participant and user.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_NO_REPORTER_FOR_ANONYMOUS_INCIDENT
message.locale: A reporter can not be recorded for an anonymous incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_MUTIPLE_RECORDS_FOR_SAME_CONCERN_AND_ROLE
message.locale: The participant already has a role of this type on the incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_MUTIPLE_RECORDS_FOR_SAME_USER_AND_ROLE
message.locale: The user already has a role of this type on the incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_ONLY_ONE_ACTIVE_REPORTER
message.locale: There can only be one active reporter for an incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: An Incident Participant role can not be created for a party that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_NOT_DETERMINED
message.locale: An Incident Participant role can not be created, because it can not be determined if the participant selected is a duplicate. Embedded message: '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_FV_CLIENT_PARTICIPANT_MODIFY
message.locale: The role cannot be changed for the party affected by the incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_FV_CLIENT_PARTICIPANT_CANCEL
message.locale: The role cannot be deleted for the party affected by the incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XRV_INCIDENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: An Incident Participant role can not be created for a cancelled Incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XRV_INCIDENT_CLOSED
message.locale: An Incident Participant role can not be created for a closed Incident.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XRV_CANCEL_LAST_CONCERN_ROLE
message.locale: The role cannot be deleted for the last incident concern participant.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_XFV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_EDIT
message.locale: The participant is marked as a duplicate and their details cannot be edited. The correct person should be added to the incident and the duplicate removed.
